tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My case was complicated one and after knowing about dr anargha madam and her expertise by a known friend. I started my invisalign treatment last year. Its just completed last week. The doctor and his team were highly professional, experienced and supported nicely. Satisfied 100% for improving my smile with invisalign :) thanks madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** ****** ****** ** ********** I got good results with ceramic braces treatment in short time. Highly recommend this hospital :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Finally I have completed my invisible braces treatment at Smile Again Dental Clinic and couldn't be happier with the results! Dr. Anargha madam her team are very patient and fixed my teeth gaps. Got desired results in just 16 months.

tags: None
review: Both the doctors are friendly and explained the issue in detail. I would recommend this dental care specialty to everyone

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Toothache,
review: She is good in the way she identified the problem. but the problem is that she doesn't connect with patient and explains how to avoid the issue in future.I seriously doesn't encourage this doctor.Also, the facility is in 3rd floor. parking will be stinky and leaking water. stair cases will look haunted. ****** ******** ***** ** ** ** ** ***** ** ******** ******* *********** ********* ****** ***** **** ******** *** ****** ****** ******* ** ** ******
reply_text: Sir, when the problem was identified and treatment was suggested to you, you opted not to take it .Your wife had come with two problems to us. We suggested a remedy for one and treatment for another. Based upon five minutes of check up you cannot be expecting to bond with the patient.Our facility is on the 2nd floor with a lift. We do have basement parking atleast the cars are not parked on the roads n i cannot be checking the basement for water leakages ,In daylight i dont think the staircase look haunted.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Cavities,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,
review: Dr listned to my problems with teeth  and has identified the cause,she  explained the problem and suggested the treatment which I underwent. overall iam satisfied with the treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor’s explanation/communication about the health issue is good. I have felt happy with the treatment.
